##### FILE: argocd_install_42.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/argocd-dex-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: dex-server
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
  name: argocd-dex-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 5
      containers:
      - command:
        - /shared/argocd-dex
        - rundex
        env:
        - name: ARGOCD_DEX_SERVER_DISABLE_TLS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dexserver.disable.tls
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/dexidp/dex:v2.37.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: dex
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5556
        - containerPort: 5557
        - containerPort: 5558
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /shared
          name: static-files
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: dexconfig
        - mountPath: /tls
          name: argocd-dex-server-tls
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/cp
        - -n
        - /usr/local/bin/argocd
        - /shared/argocd-dex
        image: quay.io/argoproj/argocd:v2.9.3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: copyutil
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /shared
          name: static-files
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: dexconfig
      serviceAccountName: argocd-dex-server
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: static-files
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: dexconfig
      - name: argocd-dex-server-tls
        secret:
          items:
          - key: tls.crt
            path: tls.crt
          - key: tls.key
            path: tls.key
          - key: ca.crt
            path: ca.crt
          optional: true
          secretName: argocd-dex-server-tls

---


Mutation:

1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/argocd-dex-server failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/initContainers/0/resources/

##### FILE: argocd_install_43.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/argocd-notifications-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: notifications-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
  name: argocd-notifications-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /usr/local/bin/argocd-notifications
        env:
        - name: ARGOCD_NOTIFICATIONS_CONTROLLER_LOGFORMAT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: notificationscontroller.log.format
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_NOTIFICATIONS_CONTROLLER_LOGLEVEL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: notificationscontroller.log.level
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_APPLICATION_NAMESPACES
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: application.namespaces
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        image: quay.io/argoproj/argocd:v2.9.3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9001
        name: argocd-notifications-controller
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/config/tls
          name: tls-certs
        - mountPath: /app/config/reposerver/tls
          name: argocd-repo-server-tls
        workingDir: /app
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: argocd-notifications-controller
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: argocd-tls-certs-cm
        name: tls-certs
      - name: argocd-repo-server-tls
        secret:
          items:
          - key: tls.crt
            path: tls.crt
          - key: tls.key
            path: tls.key
          - key: ca.crt
            path: ca.crt
          optional: true
          secretName: argocd-repo-server-tls

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/argocd-notifications-controller failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/argocd-redis:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: redis
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-redis
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
  name: argocd-redis
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-redis
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-redis
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-redis
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 5
      containers:
      - args:
        - --save
        - ""
        - --appendonly
        - "no"
        image: redis:7.0.11-alpine
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: redis
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6379
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 999
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: argocd-redis

---

  labels:

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns

    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:

          name: kube-system
  podSelector:

##### FILE: argocd50_42.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/argocd-applicationset-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-applicationset-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd-applicationset
  name: argocd-applicationset-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-applicationset-controller
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-applicationset-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - entrypoint.sh
        - argocd-applicationset-controller
        env:
        - name: NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: ARGOCD_APPLICATIONSET_CONTROLLER_ENABLE_LEADER_ELECTION
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: applicationsetcontroller.enable.leader.election
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_APPLICATIONSET_CONTROLLER_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: applicationsetcontroller.namespace
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_APPLICATIONSET_CONTROLLER_REPO_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: repo.server
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_APPLICATIONSET_CONTROLLER_POLICY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: applicationsetcontroller.policy
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_APPLICATIONSET_CONTROLLER_DEBUG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: applicationsetcontroller.debug
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_APPLICATIONSET_CONTROLLER_LOGFORMAT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: applicationsetcontroller.log.format
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_APPLICATIONSET_CONTROLLER_LOGLEVEL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: applicationsetcontroller.log.level
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_APPLICATIONSET_CONTROLLER_DRY_RUN
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: applicationsetcontroller.dryrun
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_GIT_MODULES_ENABLED
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: applicationsetcontroller.enable.git.submodule
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_APPLICATIONSET_CONTROLLER_ENABLE_PROGRESSIVE_SYNCS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: applicationsetcontroller.enable.progressive.syncs
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        image: quay.io/argoproj/argocd:v2.6.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: argocd-applicationset-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 7000
          name: webhook
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: metrics
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/config/ssh
          name: ssh-known-hosts
        - mountPath: /app/config/tls
          name: tls-certs
        - mountPath: /app/config/gpg/source
          name: gpg-keys
        - mountPath: /app/config/gpg/keys
          name: gpg-keyring
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
      serviceAccountName: argocd-applicationset-controller
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: argocd-ssh-known-hosts-cm
        name: ssh-known-hosts
      - configMap:
          name: argocd-tls-certs-cm
        name: tls-certs
      - configMap:
          name: argocd-gpg-keys-cm
        name: gpg-keys
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: gpg-keyring
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/argocd-dex-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: dex-server
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
  name: argocd-dex-server
  namespace: default

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 5
      containers:
      - command:
        - /shared/argocd-dex
        - rundex
        env:
        - name: ARGOCD_DEX_SERVER_DISABLE_TLS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dexserver.disable.tls
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/dexidp/dex:v2.35.3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: dex
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5556
        - containerPort: 5557
        - containerPort: 5558
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /shared
          name: static-files
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: dexconfig
        - mountPath: /tls
          name: argocd-dex-server-tls
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - cp
        - -n
        - /usr/local/bin/argocd
        - /shared/argocd-dex
        image: quay.io/argoproj/argocd:v2.6.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: copyutil
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /shared
          name: static-files
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: dexconfig
      serviceAccountName: argocd-dex-server
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: static-files
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: dexconfig
      - name: argocd-dex-server-tls
        secret:
          items:
          - key: tls.crt
            path: tls.crt
          - key: tls.key
            path: tls.key
          - key: ca.crt
            path: ca.crt
          optional: true
          secretName: argocd-dex-server-tls

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/argocd-notifications-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: argocd-notifications-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - argocd-notifications
        image: quay.io/argoproj/argocd:v2.6.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9001
        name: argocd-notifications-controller
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/config/tls
          name: tls-certs
        - mountPath: /app/config/reposerver/tls
          name: argocd-repo-server-tls
        workingDir: /app
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: argocd-notifications-controller
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: argocd-tls-certs-cm
        name: tls-certs
      - name: argocd-repo-server-tls
        secret:
          items:
          - key: tls.crt
            path: tls.crt
          - key: tls.key
            path: tls.key
          - key: ca.crt
            path: ca.crt
          optional: true
          secretName: argocd-repo-server-tls

      memory: 1Gi

      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

##### FILE: argocd63_44.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/argocd-dex-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: dex-server
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
  name: argocd-dex-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-dex-server
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 5
      containers:
      - command:
        - /shared/argocd-dex
        - rundex
        env:
        - name: ARGOCD_DEX_SERVER_DISABLE_TLS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: dexserver.disable.tls
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        image: ghcr.io/dexidp/dex:v2.38.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: dex
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5556
        - containerPort: 5557
        - containerPort: 5558
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /shared
          name: static-files
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: dexconfig
        - mountPath: /tls
          name: argocd-dex-server-tls
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - /bin/cp
        - -n
        - /usr/local/bin/argocd
        - /shared/argocd-dex
        image: quay.io/argoproj/argocd:v2.11.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: copyutil
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /shared
          name: static-files
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: dexconfig
      serviceAccountName: argocd-dex-server
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: static-files
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: dexconfig
      - name: argocd-dex-server-tls
        secret:
          items:
          - key: tls.crt
            path: tls.crt
          - key: tls.key
            path: tls.key
          - key: ca.crt
            path: ca.crt
          optional: true
          secretName: argocd-dex-server-tls

---

##### FILE: argocd63_45.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/argocd-notifications-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: notifications-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
  name: argocd-notifications-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-notifications-controller
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /usr/local/bin/argocd-notifications
        env:
        - name: ARGOCD_NOTIFICATIONS_CONTROLLER_LOGFORMAT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: notificationscontroller.log.format
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_NOTIFICATIONS_CONTROLLER_LOGLEVEL
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: notificationscontroller.log.level
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_APPLICATION_NAMESPACES
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: application.namespaces
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        - name: ARGOCD_NOTIFICATION_CONTROLLER_SELF_SERVICE_NOTIFICATION_ENABLED
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: notificationscontroller.selfservice.enabled
              name: argocd-cmd-params-cm
              optional: true
        image: quay.io/argoproj/argocd:v2.11.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9001
        name: argocd-notifications-controller
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/config/tls
          name: tls-certs
        - mountPath: /app/config/reposerver/tls
          name: argocd-repo-server-tls
        workingDir: /app
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: argocd-notifications-controller
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: argocd-tls-certs-cm
        name: tls-certs
      - name: argocd-repo-server-tls
        secret:
          items:
          - key: tls.crt
            path: tls.crt
          - key: tls.key
            path: tls.key
          - key: ca.crt
            path: ca.crt
          optional: true
          secretName: argocd-repo-server-tls

---

                matchLabels:
                  app.kubernetes.io/name: argocd-redis

              labelSelector:
                matchLabels:
                  app.kubernetes.io/part-of: argocd
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 5

        - --save
        - ""
        - --appendonly
        - "no"

          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 999
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: argocd-redis

##### FILE: argocduihttps.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to argocd/Ingress/argocd-server-https:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/force-ssl-redirect: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-passthrough: "true"
  name: argocd-server-https
  namespace: argocd
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: argocd.minikube.local
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: argocd-server
            port:
              name: https
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: articles.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/articles-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: articles-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: articles-service
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: articles-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - python
        - manage.py
        - runserver
        - 0.0.0.0:8001
        env:
        - name: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        - name: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: rabbitmq-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: wikiculture-config
        image: ghcr.io/tomdieu/wikiculture/article_service:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: articles-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8001
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /articles/staticfiles
          name: articles-static-volume
      - command:
        - python
        - consumer.py
        env:
        - name: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        - name: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: rabbitmq-config
        image: ghcr.io/tomdieu/wikiculture/article_service:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: consumer
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - python
        - manage.py
        - collectstatic
        - --noinput
        env:
        - name: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBITMQ_USERNAME
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        - name: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: RABBITMQ_PASSWORD
              name: rabbitmq-secret
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: rabbitmq-config
        image: ghcr.io/tomdieu/wikiculture/article_service:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: collectstatic
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /articles/staticfiles
          name: articles-static-volume
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: articles-static-volume

---

##### FILE: article-service_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/article-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: article-service
    app.kubernetes.io/name: article-service
  name: article-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: article-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: article-service
        app.kubernetes.io/name: article-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: article-service-secrets
        - name: SPRING_DATASOURCE_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: article-service-secrets
        - name: SPRING_CONFIG_LOCATION
          value: /config/application.yml
        image: kovengers/article-service:109
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: article-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 400m
            memory: 400Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config
      nodeSelector:
        kakaoi.io/kke-nodepool: backend-node
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: article-service-config
        name: config

---

##### FILE: artifact_tracker_deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/artifact-tracker-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    db: pgsql
  name: artifact-tracker-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: artifact-tracker-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: artifact-tracker-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PL_JWT_SIGNING_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: jwt-signing-key
              name: cloud-auth-secrets
        - name: PL_POSTGRES_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PL_POSTGRES_USERNAME
              name: pl-db-secrets
        - name: PL_POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PL_POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: pl-db-secrets
        - name: PL_VIZIER_VERSION
          value: ""
        - name: PL_CLI_VERSION
          value: ""
        - name: PL_OPERATOR_VERSION
          value: ""
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: pl-db-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: pl-tls-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: pl-artifact-config
        - configMapRef:
            name: pl-domain-config
        image: cloud-artifact_tracker_server_image
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 50750
            scheme: HTTPS
        name: artifact-tracker-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 50750
          name: http2
        - containerPort: 50751
          name: metrics-http
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 50750
            scheme: HTTPS
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 10100
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /certs
          name: certs
        - mountPath: /creds
          name: artifact-access-sa
          readOnly: true
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 10100
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      volumes:
      - name: certs
        secret:
          secretName: service-tls-certs
      - name: artifact-access-sa
        secret:
          optional: true
          secretName: artifact-access-sa

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/artifactory:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
  name: artifactory
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: tooling.artifactory.olami.uk
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: artifactory-artifactory-nginx
            port:
              number: 8082
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - tooling.artifactory.olami.uk
    secretName: tooling.artifactory.olami.uk

              name: aikey

        name: aspnetcore
        ports:

        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux

##### FILE: asustor-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to asustor/Ingress/asustor:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/configuration-snippet: |
      if ($request_uri ~* "^/plexmediaserver") {
        return 308 https://plex.abbottland.io$request_uri;
      }
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/whitelist-source-range: 10.0.0.0/8,192.168.0.0/16,172.20.0.0/12,10.244.0.0/16
  name: asustor
  namespace: asustor
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: asustor.local.abbottland.io
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: asustor
            port:
              number: 9000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix
  tls:
  - hosts:
    - asustor.local.abbottland.io
    secretName: asustor-tls

##### FILE: atlas-schema-configmap.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/jdw-postgresql-non-schema:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  schema.sql: |
    CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS auth;

    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.roles
    (
        role_id             BIGINT      NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
        role_name           TEXT        NOT NULL,
        role_description    TEXT        NOT NULL,
        status              TEXT        NOT NULL DEFAULT 'ACTIVE',
        created_by_user_id  BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_time        TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        modified_by_user_id BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        modified_time       TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (role_id)
    );

    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.users
    (
        user_id             BIGINT      NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
        email_address       TEXT        NOT NULL UNIQUE,
        password            TEXT        NOT NULL,
        status              TEXT        NOT NULL DEFAULT 'ACTIVE',
        created_by_user_id  BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_time        TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        modified_by_user_id BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        modified_time       TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
    );

    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.users_roles
    (
        user_id            BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        role_id            BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_by_user_id BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_time       TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (user_id, role_id),
        CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES auth.users (user_id),
        CONSTRAINT fk_role FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES auth.roles (role_id)
    );

    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.profiles
    (
        profile_id          BIGINT      NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
        user_id             BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        first_name          TEXT        NOT NULL,
        middle_name         TEXT,
        last_name           TEXT        NOT NULL,
        birthdate           DATE        NOT NULL,
        created_by_user_id  BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_time        TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        modified_by_user_id BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        modified_time       TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (profile_id),
        CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES auth.users (user_id)
    );

    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.addresses
    (
        address_id          BIGINT      NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
        profile_id          BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        address_line_1      TEXT        NOT NULL,
        address_line_2      TEXT,
        city                TEXT        NOT NULL,
        state_province      TEXT        NOT NULL,
        postal_code         TEXT        NOT NULL,
        country             TEXT        NOT NULL,
        created_by_user_id  BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_time        TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        modified_by_user_id BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        modified_time       TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (address_id),
        CONSTRAINT fk_profile FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES auth.profiles (profile_id)
    );

    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.profile_icons
    (
        icon_id             BIGINT      NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
        profile_id          BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        icon                BYTEA       NOT NULL,
        created_by_user_id  BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_time        TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        modified_by_user_id BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        modified_time       TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (icon_id),
        CONSTRAINT fk_profile FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES auth.profiles (profile_id)
    );

    DO $$
    BEGIN
        IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pg_roles WHERE rolname = 'app') THEN
            CREATE ROLE app;
        END IF;
    END
    $$;

    GRANT USAGE ON SCHEMA auth TO app;
    GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON ALL TABLES IN SCHEMA auth TO app;
    ALTER DEFAULT PRIVILEGES IN SCHEMA auth GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON TABLES TO app;
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: jdw-postgresql-non-schema
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: atlas-schema-configmap1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/jdw-postgresql-prd-schema:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  schema.sql: |
    CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS auth;

    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.roles
    (
        role_id             BIGINT      NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
        role_name           TEXT        NOT NULL,
        role_description    TEXT        NOT NULL,
        status              TEXT        NOT NULL DEFAULT 'ACTIVE',
        created_by_user_id  BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_time        TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        modified_by_user_id BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        modified_time       TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (role_id)
    );

    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.users
    (
        user_id             BIGINT      NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
        email_address       TEXT        NOT NULL UNIQUE,
        password            TEXT        NOT NULL,
        status              TEXT        NOT NULL DEFAULT 'ACTIVE',
        created_by_user_id  BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_time        TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        modified_by_user_id BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        modified_time       TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (user_id)
    );

    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.users_roles
    (
        user_id            BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        role_id            BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_by_user_id BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_time       TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (user_id, role_id),
        CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES auth.users (user_id),
        CONSTRAINT fk_role FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES auth.roles (role_id)
    );

    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.profiles
    (
        profile_id          BIGINT      NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
        user_id             BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        first_name          TEXT        NOT NULL,
        middle_name         TEXT,
        last_name           TEXT        NOT NULL,
        birthdate           DATE        NOT NULL,
        created_by_user_id  BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_time        TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        modified_by_user_id BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        modified_time       TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (profile_id),
        CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES auth.users (user_id)
    );

    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.addresses
    (
        address_id          BIGINT      NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
        profile_id          BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        address_line_1      TEXT        NOT NULL,
        address_line_2      TEXT,
        city                TEXT        NOT NULL,
        state_province      TEXT        NOT NULL,
        postal_code         TEXT        NOT NULL,
        country             TEXT        NOT NULL,
        created_by_user_id  BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_time        TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        modified_by_user_id BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        modified_time       TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (address_id),
        CONSTRAINT fk_profile FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES auth.profiles (profile_id)
    );

    CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS auth.profile_icons
    (
        icon_id             BIGINT      NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY,
        profile_id          BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        icon                BYTEA       NOT NULL,
        created_by_user_id  BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        created_time        TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        modified_by_user_id BIGINT      NOT NULL,
        modified_time       TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
        PRIMARY KEY (icon_id),
        CONSTRAINT fk_profile FOREIGN KEY (profile_id) REFERENCES auth.profiles (profile_id)
    );

    DO $$
    BEGIN
        IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM pg_roles WHERE rolname = 'app') THEN
            CREATE ROLE app;
        END IF;
    END
    $$;

    GRANT USAGE ON SCHEMA auth TO app;
    GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON ALL TABLES IN SCHEMA auth TO app;
    ALTER DEFAULT PRIVILEGES IN SCHEMA auth GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON TABLES TO app;
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: jdw-postgresql-prd-schema
  namespace: default

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: attendance-svc
  name: attendance-svc
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: attendance-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: attendance-svc
      name: attendance-svc
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: StudentServiceUrl
          value: http://student-clusterip
        - name: ConnectionStrings__DefaultConnection
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: connectionString
              name: mongo-secret
        - name: RabbitMQ__Host
          value: rabbit-clusterip
        - name: RabbitMQ__Username
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: rabbit-secret
        - name: RabbitMQ__Password
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: rabbit-secret
        - name: AzureAd__Instance
          value: https://login.microsoftonline.com/
        - name: AzureAd__TenantId
          value: TENANT_ID
        - name: AzureAd__ClientId
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: clientId
              name: azure-secret
        - name: AzureAd__ClientSecret
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: clientSecret
              name: azure-secret
        - name: AzureAd__Scopes
          value: SCOPES
        - name: DownstreamApi__BaseUrl
          value: https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0
        - name: DownstreamApi__Scopes__0
          value: SCOPES
        - name: DownstreamApi__Scopes__1
          value: openid
        - name: DownstreamApi__Scopes__2
          value: profile
        - name: DownstreamApi__Scopes__3
          value: offline_access
        - name: DownstreamApi__Scopes__4
          value: email
        image: realshinchoku/ddhc-attendance-svc:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: attendance-svc
      restartPolicy: Always

kind: Deployment

    matchLabels:
      app: auction-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auction-svc

      containers:
      - env:
        - name: RabbitMq__Host
          value: rabbit-clusterip
        - name: RabbitMq__Username
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rabbitUn
              name: auction-secret
        - name: RabbitMq__Password
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rabbitPw
              name: auction-secret
        - name: ConnectionStrings__DefaultConnection
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: connString
              name: auction-secret
        - name: IdentityServiceUrl
          value: https://id.milwaukeesoftware.net
        - name: Kestrel__Endpoints__Grpc__Protocols
          value: Http2
        - name: Kestrel__Endpoints__Grpc__Url
          value: http://+:7777
        - name: Kestrel__Endpoints__WebApi__Protocols
          value: Http1
        - name: Kestrel__Endpoints__WebApi__Url
          value: http://+:80
        image: amg31/auction-svc

##### FILE: ausf-configmap1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/ausf-configmap:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  ausfcfg.yaml: |
    info:
      version: 1.0.2
      description: AUSF initial local configuration

    configuration:
      sbi: # Service-based interface information
        scheme: http # the protocol for sbi (http or https)
        registerIPv4: ausf-nausf # IP used to register to NRF
        bindingIPv4: 0.0.0.0  # IP used to bind the service
        port: 8000 # Port used to bind the service
        tls: # the local path of TLS key
          pem: config/TLS/ausf.pem # AUSF TLS Certificate
          key: config/TLS/ausf.key # AUSF TLS Private key
      serviceNameList: # the SBI services provided by this AUSF, refer to TS 29.509
        - nausf-auth # Nausf_UEAuthentication service
      nrfUri: http://nrf-nnrf:8000 # a valid URI of NRF
      plmnSupportList: # the PLMNs (Public Land Mobile Network) list supported by this AUSF
        - mcc: 001 # Mobile Country Code (3 digits string, digit: 0~9)
          mnc: 01  # Mobile Network Code (2 or 3 digits string, digit: 0~9)
      groupId: ausfGroup001 # ID for the group of the AUSF
      eapAkaSupiImsiPrefix: false # including "imsi-" prefix or not when using the SUPI to do EAP-AKA' authentication

    # the kind of log output
    # debugLevel: how detailed to output, value: trace, debug, info, warn, error, fatal, panic
    # ReportCaller: enable the caller report or not, value: true or false
    logger:
      AUSF:
        debugLevel: info
        ReportCaller: false
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app: free5gc
  name: ausf-configmap
  namespace: default

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: ausf-deployment1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/free5gc-ausf:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: free5gc
    nf: ausf
  name: free5gc-ausf
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: free5gc
      nf: ausf
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: free5gc
        nf: ausf
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config
        - config/ausfcfg.yaml
        command:
        - ./ausf
        env:
        - name: GIN_MODE
          value: release
        image: edierbra/free5gc:v3.2.5
        name: ausf
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /free5gc/config/
          name: ausf-volume
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z $DEPENDENCIES; do echo waiting for the AMF; sleep 2; done;
        env:
        - name: DEPENDENCIES
          value: amf-namf:8000
        image: busybox:1.32.0
        name: wait-amf
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - until nc -z $DEPENDENCIES; do echo waiting for the AMF2; sleep 2; done;
        env:
        - name: DEPENDENCIES
          value: amf2-namf:8000
        image: busybox:1.32.0
        name: wait-amf2
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: ausf-volume
        projected:
          sources:
          - configMap:
              name: ausf-configmap

---

##### FILE: auth17.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
        track: stable
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: kelseyhightower/auth:2.0.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 81
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 81
          name: health
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readiness
            port: 81
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.2
            memory: 10Mi

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/auth failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: auth20.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
        track: stable
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: kelseyhightower/auth:2.0.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 81
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 81
          name: health
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readiness
            port: 81
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.2
            memory: 10Mi

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: alpha-auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: alpha-auth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: alpha-auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DB_HOST
              name: app-configmap
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: DB_PASSWORD
              name: app-secrets
        image: devopseasylearning/apha-auth:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: alpha-auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

##### FILE: auth34.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/supabase-auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: supabase-auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: supabase-auth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: supabase-auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: GOTRUE_API_HOST
          value: 0.0.0.0
        - name: GOTRUE_API_PORT
          value: "9999"
        - name: API_EXTERNAL_URL
          value: http://supabase.example.com
        - name: GOTRUE_DB_DRIVER
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: supabase-db
        - name: GOTRUE_DB_DATABASE_URL
          value: postgres://supabase_auth_admin:$(POSTGRES_PASSWORD)@supabase-postgres-service:5432/postgres
        - name: GOTRUE_SITE_URL
          value: http://app.example.com
        - name: GOTRUE_URI_ALLOW_LIST
          value: ${ADDITIONAL_REDIRECT_URLS}
        - name: GOTRUE_DISABLE_SIGNUP
          value: "true"
        - name: GOTRUE_JWT_ADMIN_ROLES
          value: service_role
        - name: GOTRUE_JWT_AUD
          value: authenticated
        - name: GOTRUE_JWT_DEFAULT_GROUP_NAME
          value: authenticated
        - name: GOTRUE_JWT_EXP
          value: "3600"
        - name: GOTRUE_JWT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: secret
              name: supabase-jwt
        - name: GOTRUE_EXTERNAL_EMAIL_ENABLED
          value: "true"
        - name: GOTRUE_MAILER_AUTOCONFIRM
          value: "false"
        - name: GOTRUE_SMTP_ADMIN_EMAIL
          value: no-reply@example.com
        - name: GOTRUE_SMTP_HOST
          value: smtp.example.com
        - name: GOTRUE_SMTP_PORT
          value: "465"
        - name: GOTRUE_SMTP_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: username
              name: gotrue-smtp
        - name: GOTRUE_SMTP_PASS
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: gotrue-smtp
        - name: GOTRUE_SMTP_SENDER_NAME
          value: Project Name
        - name: GOTRUE_MAILER_URLPATHS_INVITE
          value: ${API_EXTERNAL_URL}/auth/v1/verify
        - name: GOTRUE_MAILER_URLPATHS_CONFIRMATION
          value: ${API_EXTERNAL_URL}/auth/v1/verify
        - name: GOTRUE_MAILER_URLPATHS_RECOVERY
          value: ${API_EXTERNAL_URL}/auth/v1/verify
        - name: GOTRUE_MAILER_URLPATHS_EMAIL_CHANGE
          value: ${API_EXTERNAL_URL}/auth/v1/verify
        - name: GOTRUE_EXTERNAL_PHONE_ENABLED
          value: "false"
        - name: GOTRUE_SMS_AUTOCONFIRM
          value: "false"
        image: supabase/gotrue:v2.158.1
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 9999
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
        name: supabase-auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9999

---

##### FILE: auth37.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
        track: stable
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: kelseyhightower/auth:1.0.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 81
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 15
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 81
          name: health
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readiness
            port: 81
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.05
            memory: 10Mi

##### FILE: auth47.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to production/Deployment/ms-rrts-at-auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: ms-rrts-at-auth
  namespace: production
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: ms-rrts-at-auth
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: ms-rrts-at-auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ENABLE_APM
          value: "1"
        - name: NODE_ENV
          value: production
        - name: ENV_GATEWAY_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: env-gateway-token
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: JWT_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: jwt-token
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: RABBITMQ_ENDPOINT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rabbitmq-endpoint
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mysql-db
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret

          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: cloud-name
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: CLOUD_API_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: cloud-api-key
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: CLOUD_API_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: cloud-api-secret
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: CLIENT_URL
          value: https://localhost:3000
        - name: API_GATEWAY_URL
          value: http://ms-rrts-at-gateway.production.svc.cluster.local:4000
        - name: ELASTIC_SEARCH_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elasticsearch-url
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: ELASTIC_APM_SERVER_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elastic-apm-server-url
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        - name: ELASTIC_APM_SECRET_TOKEN
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: elastic-apm-secret-token
              name: ms-rrts-at-backend-secret
        image: gordonsdev/p02-auth-service:stable
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: ms-rrts-at-auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4002
          name: auth-port
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 150Mi

              key: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
              name: grid-aws-access-token
        - name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
              name: grid-aws-access-token
        - name: PLAY_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: play-secret
              name: grid-play-secret
        image: eu.gcr.io/grid-301122/auth:containerised
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /management/healthcheck
            port: 9000
          initialDelaySeconds: 120
        name: auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /management/healthcheck
            port: 9000
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 384Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/gu
          name: gu-config
        - mountPath: /etc/grid
          name: grid-config
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: gu
        name: gu-config
      - configMap:
          name: grid
        name: grid-config

##### FILE: auth59_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to cctns-new/Deployment/psa-auth-server-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: auth-app
  name: psa-auth-server-app
  namespace: cctns-new
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth-app
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: auth-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: CONFIG_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: config_server_address
              name: psa-config-cm
        - name: auth_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: auth_server_address
              name: psa-auth-cm
        - name: EUREKA_SERVER_ADDRESS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: eureka_server_address
              name: psa-eureka-cm
        - name: APPLICATION_SERVER
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              apiVersion: v1
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: ACTIVE_PROFILE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: ACTIVE_PROFILE
              name: active-profile
        - name: TZ
          value: Asia/Kolkata
        image: docker-registry:5000/psa-auth-server:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: auth-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8079
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 700Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /root/logs
          name: logs-volume
      serviceAccount: cctns
      serviceAccountName: cctns
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /Data_NAS_NEW/microservice-log/auth
          type: ""
        name: logs-volume

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mini-ecommerce/Deployment/auth-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: auth-deployment
  namespace: mini-ecommerce
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: Service
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: SERVICE
              name: auth-config
        - name: PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: PORT
              name: auth-config
        - name: JWT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_SECRET
              name: auth-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_HOST
              name: postgresql-config
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_DB
              name: postgresql-config
        - name: POSTGRES_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PORT
              name: postgresql-config
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_USER
              name: postgresql-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
              name: postgresql-secret
        - name: POSTGRES_URL
          value: postgresql://$(POSTGRES_USER):$(POSTGRES_PASSWORD)@$(POSTGRES_HOST):$(POSTGRES_PORT)/$(POSTGRES_DB)?sslmode=disable
        image: foyezar/ecommerce-auth
        name: auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3001
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi

##### FILE: auth-checkpassword-conf-ext.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mailserver/ConfigMap/auth-checkpassword-conf-ext:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  auth-checkpassword.conf.ext: |
    # Authentication for checkpassword users. Included from 10-auth.conf.
    #
    # <doc/wiki/AuthDatabase.CheckPassword.txt>

    passdb {
      driver = checkpassword
      args = /usr/bin/checkpassword
    }

    # passdb lookup should return also userdb info
    userdb {
      driver = prefetch
    }

    # Standard checkpassword doesn't support direct userdb lookups.
    # If you need checkpassword userdb, the checkpassword must support
    # Dovecot-specific extensions.
    #userdb {
    #  driver = checkpassword
    #  args = /usr/bin/checkpassword
    #}
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: auth-checkpassword-conf-ext
  namespace: mailserver

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: Authdb-depl.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgres-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: postgres-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_DB
          value: auth
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: postgres
        image: postgres:latest
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432

---

##### FILE: auth-delp.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: auth-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_URI
          value: mongodb://auth-mongo-srv:27017/auth
        - name: JWT_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_KEY
              name: jwt-secret
        image: abdessalamwizli/auth
        name: auth

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: auth-deny-conf-ext.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to mailserver/ConfigMap/auth-deny-conf-ext:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  auth-deny.conf.ext: |
    # Deny access for users. Included from 10-auth.conf.

    # Users can be (temporarily) disabled by adding a passdb with deny=yes.
    # If the user is found from that database, authentication will fail.
    # The deny passdb should always be specified before others, so it gets
    # checked first.

    # Example deny passdb using passwd-file. You can use any passdb though.
    passdb {
      driver = passwd-file
      deny = yes

      # File contains a list of usernames, one per line
      args = /etc/dovecot/deny-users
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: auth-deny-conf-ext
  namespace: mailserver

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: auth-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:

      - env:
        - name: JWT_SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_SECRET_KEY
              name: jwt-secret
        - name: MONGO_URI
          value: mongodb://auth-mongo-srv:27017/auth
        image: abanoubfathy/auth
        imagePullPolicy: Always

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: auth-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_URI
          value: mongodb://auth-mongo-srv:27017/auth
        - name: JWT_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_KEY
              name: jwt-secret
        image: asia-southeast2-docker.pkg.dev/utopian-bonito-411004/ticket-artifacts/auth

##### FILE: auth-depl23.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: auth-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_URI
          value: mongodb://auth-mongo-srv:27017/auth
        - name: JWT_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_KEY
              name: jwt-secret
        image: nzwilliammorris/auth
        name: auth

---

##### FILE: auth-depl24.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: auth-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: JWT_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_KEY
              name: jwt-secret
        - name: MONGO_URI
          value: mongodb://auth-mongo-srv:27017/auth
        image: berkinanik/ticketing-auth:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api/users/health
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: auth

---

##### FILE: auth-depl37.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: auth-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_URI
          value: mongodb://auth-mongo-srv:27017/auth
        - name: JWT_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_KEY
              name: jwt-secret
        image: alexmelia41/auth
        name: auth

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: auth-depl4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth-depl:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: auth-depl
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: JWT_SECRET_KEY
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: JWT_SECRET_KEY
              name: jwt-secret
        - name: MONGO_URI
          value: mongodb://auth-mongo-srv:27017/auth
        image: abanoubfathy/auth
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: auth

---

##### FILE: auth-deploy.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: auth
  name: auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 3
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: auth-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: auth-secret
        image: rylephoenix/auth
        name: auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: auth
  name: auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 3
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: auth-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: auth-secret
        image: siriusblack001/auth
        name: auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.2"
            memory: 256Mi

---

##### FILE: auth-deploy11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/auth-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: auth-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: auth-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: auth-secret
        image: mashilo/auth
        name: auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.1"
            memory: 128Mi

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: auth
  name: auth
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: auth
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 3
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: auth-configmap
        - secretRef:
            name: auth-secret
        image: bhavasagar09/auth
        name: auth
        ports:

##### FILE: auth-deployment12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/traefik-forward-auth:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: traefik-forward-auth
  name: traefik-forward-auth
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: traefik-forward-auth
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/traefik-forward-auth: runtime/default
      labels:
        app: traefik-forward-auth
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVIDERS_GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PROVIDERS_GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET
              name: traefik-forward-auth
        - name: PROVIDERS_GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: PROVIDERS_GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID
              name: traefik-forward-auth
        - name: SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: SECRET
              name: traefik-forward-auth
        - name: DEFAULT_PROVIDER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: DEFAULT_PROVIDER
              name: traefik-forward-auth
        - name: INSECURE_COOKIE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: INSECURE_COOKIE
              name: traefik-forward-auth
        - name: COOKIE_DOMAIN
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: COOKIE_DOMAIN
              name: traefik-forward-auth
        - name: AUTH_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: AUTH_HOST
              name: traefik-forward-auth
        - name: URL_PATH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: URL_PATH
              name: traefik-forward-auth
        image: thomseddon/traefik-forward-auth
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 4181
        name: traefik-forward-auth
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4181
          name: http
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 10Mi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsGroup: 65534
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65534

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/Deployment/traefik-forward-auth failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource kube-system/Deployment/traefik-forward-auth failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/
